show_message.description: Display a message on the Divoom Pixoo.

entity_id.description: The entity_id of the Divoom Pixoo device.

position.description: The position on the screen to start the message (x, y coordinates).

color.description: The RGB color for the message.

font.description: The font type for the message. Currently only 'FONT_GICKO' and 'FONT_PICO_8' are supported.

image.description: The path to the image file to display on the Pixoo.

image_position.description: The position on the screen to place the image (x, y coordinates).
